revision.text: Possibly: A treatise of being born again without which no man can be saved. : To which is added, a discourse on the duty and advantage of singular piety. And some extracts from a late writer, suited to the design of this treatise, by S. Wright. (Boston: : Printed by J. Draper, for D. Henchman in Cornhill., MDCCXLII. [1742]) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/976564484
